categoryContent.paragraphOne: If you like one song by an artist, but don't dig the rest of their stuff find out who the producer is and see what other work they've done.
categoryContent.paragraphTwo: The producer can play a big role in how the final song turns out.

categoryContent.paragraphOne: Telling someone that a movie / book has a great twist is, in itself, a major spoiler. Donâ€™t do that.
